byline.original: By SHANNON DOYNE and HOLLY EPSTEIN OJALVO

abstract: Holding a roundtable discussion examining evidence and arguments over Shakespearean authorship and the role of the Bard in culture and the world.
snippet: Holding a roundtable discussion examining evidence and arguments over Shakespearean authorship and the role of the Bard in culture and the world.

headline.main: What's in a Name? Considering the Shakespeare Authorship Question
